[{"id":288,"cards_users_id":156,"languages_code":"fr-FR","description":"1. Je suis malentendant.e
(comme 5,18 millions

équipé d’ appareils auditifs.
2. Je suis dans un lieu
bruyant."},{"id":289,"cards_users_id":156,"languages_code":"en-US","description":"1. I am hard of hearing
(like 5.18 million
of French) and sometimes
equipped with hearing aids.
2. I am in a place
noisy."}]

[{"id":292,"cards_users_id":158,"languages_code":"fr-FR","description":"1. Je suis malvoyant.e :
je ne peux pas distinguer
un visage à 4 mètres.
(comme 1,3 millions
de français)
2. Je suis dans un endroit
très mal éclairé / il fait nuit."},{"id":293,"cards_users_id":158,"languages_code":"en-US","description":"1. I am visually impaired:
I can't distinguish
a face 4 meters away.
(like 1.3 million
of French)
2. I am in a place
very poorly lit / it's dark."}]

[{"id":296,"cards_users_id":160,"languages_code":"fr-FR","description":"1. Je suis en fauteuil roulant.
(comme 380 000
français)
2. J’utilise une canne
ou un déambulateur."},{"id":297,"cards_users_id":160,"languages_code":"en-US","description":"1. I am in a wheelchair.
(like 380,000
French)
2. I use a cane
or a walker."}]

[{"id":298,"cards_users_id":161,"languages_code":"fr-FR","description":"J’ ai des allergies
alimentaires, respiratoires,
de peau, … (comme 25%
des français)"},{"id":299,"cards_users_id":161,"languages_code":"en-US","description":"I have allergies
food, respiratory,
of skin, … (like 25%
French)"}]

[{"id":300,"cards_users_id":162,"languages_code":"fr-FR","description":"1. Je ne maîtrise
pas la lecture. (comme
2,5 millions de personnes
illettrées en France)
2. Je suis dyslexique.
(comme 5% des français)"},{"id":301,"cards_users_id":162,"languages_code":"en-US","description":"1. I am not in control
not reading. (as
2.5 million people
illiterate in France)
2. I am dyslexic.
(like 5% of French people)"}]

[{"id":302,"cards_users_id":163,"languages_code":"fr-FR","description":"1. J’ ai un trouble de l’ élocution :
je parle avec difficulté.
2. Je bégaye.
(comme 5 à 10%
des français)"},{"id":303,"cards_users_id":163,"languages_code":"en-US","description":"1. I have a speech impediment:
I speak with difficulty.
2. I stutter.
(like 5 to 10%
French)"}]

[{"id":304,"cards_users_id":164,"languages_code":"fr-FR","description":"Je mesure 1,98 mètres
(comme 1% des hommes
en France) ou je mesure
1,40 mètres (comme 1%
des femmes en France)."},{"id":305,"cards_users_id":164,"languages_code":"en-US","description":"I am 1.98 meters tall
(like 1% of men
in France) where I measure
1.40 meters (like 1%
women in France)."}]

[{"id":306,"cards_users_id":165,"languages_code":"fr-FR","description":"J’ ai un budget restreint.
(10 millions de français
